channel.title: Kill 2 same npc's to get teled in minigame how to?

item.title: Kill 2 same npc's to get teled in minigame how to?
item.dc:creator: @ltownerlt ltownerlt
item.description:
@ltownerlt wrote:

ok i need to know how to make that i would have to kill 2 npcâ€™s to get teled not when i kill only 1 heres the code i use for 1 npc:

[code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2629) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

			ppl.heightLevel = 8;
			ppl.sendMessage("Good Job! prepare for wave 3");

i need to make that i would have to kill 2 monsters to get to wave 3 not 1 monster
